name: JumpingJack
description:
Jack, a test pilot just got his Car Engine re-modified with a fighter jet engine. His Employer, a speed-craved group of engineer-scientist (The Company) found this out and stole his engine with the hopes to reverse-engineer his design. Jack's engine is a family invention capable of accommodating any modification on any automobile even fighter-jets. They, The Company know this and they want it at all cost.
Help Jack escape the clutches of The Company as he flies helplessly out of the unending battle of securing a family treasure out of The Company's facilities.
